The Awesome Step-Sequencer

Stepp0r is a Step-Sequencer for Renoise on the Launchpad written by Ingolf Wagner (aka Palo van Dalo). Right now, it’s working fine as a “forget the computer” type control.

You can * punch in your sequences, * arange patterns on the pattern matrix * you can use the keyboard to record your melodies using the osc server inside of Renoise.

You want to start using it?

  • Buy a launchpad (at ebay for example).
  • Download the plugin.
  • Install the plugin in renoise.
  • Have a look at the Documentation.

If you find bugs please report them here or use UserVoice (on the bottom right).

And if you want to join the development just visit the github page.

How to say thank you ?

  • You can put me on the guest list of your next performance (especially if you perform in Berlin)
  • You can invite me to lunch
  • You can press the flatter button
  • You can just post your thank you on the renoise forum post about this project.
